titles.title: Workforce Investment Disclosure Act of 2020
Workforce Investment Disclosure Act of 2020

A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers to disclose to the Securities and Exchange Commission information regarding human capital management policies, practices, and performance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Workforce Investment Disclosure Act of 2020
This bill requires an issuer of securities to disclose certain information regarding human capital management policies, practices, and performance. This information includes workforce data related to
full-time, part-time, and contingent employees; turnover and retention rates; racial, ethnic, and gender composition; skills, training, and capabilities; health and safety; compensation and incentives; and recruiting.
